name: PHAssetResource
desc: An underlying data resource associated with a photo, video, or Live Photo asset in the Photos library.

items.name: class func assetResources(for: PHAsset) -> [PHAssetResource]
items.desc: Returns the list of data resources associated with an asset.

items.name: class func assetResources(for: PHLivePhoto) -> [PHAssetResource]
items.desc: Returns the list of data resources associated with a Live Photo object.

items.name: var type: PHAssetResourceType
items.desc: The relationship of this asset resource to its owning asset.

items.name: enum PHAssetResourceType
items.desc: Describes the relationship of an asset resource to its owning asset.

items.name: var assetLocalIdentifier: String
items.desc: The unique identifier for the asset object this resource is associated with.

items.name: var uniformTypeIdentifier: String
items.desc: The uniform type identifier for the asset resourceâ€™s image or video data.

items.name: var originalFilename: String
items.desc: The original filename of the asset resource from when it was created or imported.
